title: “El Chapo” Escaped Capture Once Again, Suffers Wounds
text: “El Chapo” Escaped Capture Once Again, Suffers Wounds Saturday, 17 October 2015 (21 minutes ago) Joaquin “ El Chapo ” Guzman, the elusive Mexican drug kingpin, has avoided capture once again but not without suffering some wounds in the process. It has been reported that El Chapo narrowly escaped from Mexican government forces near the base of operations of the Sinaloa drug cartel leader. Reuters reports: In a statement, the Mexican government said […] The post “El Chapo” Escaped Capture Once Again, Suffers Wounds appeared first on Hip-Hop Wired.
